ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Leaving Private Guild Channel Help
ygData.msgSnippet:
Have you tried to right click the top of chat window and choose from
channels option? Desertwind (Wood Elf Ranger) - Firona Vie Ljian (Romulan) - QTG Briyana
ygData.messageBody:
Have you tried to right click the top of chat window and choose from
channels option?

Desertwind (Wood Elf Ranger) - Firona Vie
Ljian (Romulan) - QTG
Briyana (Barbarian Beastlord) - Quellious
Eleahna (Barbarian Beastlord) - Morell Thule
Vickel (Wood Elf Ranger) - Morell Thule
Sshaer (Vah Shir Beastlord) - Morell Thule -"Till shade is gone, till water
is gone, into the Shadow with teeth bared, screaming defiance with the last
breath."
Sumdumfrog (Froglok Shaman) - Morell Thule - "Frogloks don't die, we just
croak and hop away."
Paksenarryon (High Elf Paladin) - Morell Thule

-------Original Message-------

From: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Date: Saturday, August 30, 2003 04:47:41 PM
To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] Leaving Private Guild Channel Help

I need to know what the command is to Permantly leave a Private Guild
Channel. I have tried /leaveall but when I log back in the channel is
there again. Nothing I have tried in game from GM has worked. I can't
even speak to NPCs because everything I say goes directly into the
channel because I Auto Joined this channel. I can speak /ooc but that
is it. There has to be some kind of command for this other than going
into my EQ comp files. Anyone have any GOOD Guild URLs with this type
of info?

Thanks

Mari
